Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a tiebreaking single in the eighth inning to give the Royals the lead
Brooks Lee made an error on a potential double play which led to the Royals scoring
Tommy Pham hit a slow four-hopper to Brooks Lee and reached on an infield error as the shortstop barehanded the ball and bounced his throw past first base
Post-Match Reflections: Kansas City manager Matt Quatraro praised the team's resilience and effort after the comeback win
Minnesota manager Rocco Baldelli expressed frustration over the bullpen's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri
Twins first baseman Carlos Santana left the game in the sixth inning due to an unspecified illness and was replaced by Kyle Farmer
Others: Daniel Lynch allowed one hit in three scoreless innings
Lucas Erceg pitched a perfect ninth for his 10th save
Bailey Ober dominated the Twins with seven strikeouts and no walks
